thread.title: People are still playing with and making 'Duck Army Bombs' and it's still amazing
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: People are still playing with and making 'Duck Army Bombs' and it's still amazing - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: People are still playing with and making 'Duck Army Bombs' and it's still amazing
text:
Mythbusters' Adam Savage is back and yes, he's still playing with and getting untold amounts of joy out of that screaming squeezy duck toy that took the world by storm except now he's showing you how to make the ultimate 'Duck Army Bomb' just like he does. And of course it's still great.
The other thing that's great? There's now a pink flamingo version of the squeaking/screaming duck to add a little spicy variation to the world of 'Duck Army Bombs' and they make just as much glorious noise.
Here's how you can make it yourself.
Via YouTube

MORE: Watch: Mythbusters' Adam Savage just weaponised the 'Duck Army' toy
